section.title: Disable SNMP if Default Public String Exists
section.para:
Disables the SNMP agent if the default community 'public' has not been changed.
SNMP

If you must use SNMP to monitor your system, ensure that the default public and private community strings are changed in snmpd.conf(5) .
snmpd
See for a list of the specific services being disabled.

note.title: Note: Manual action may be required
note.para: This module only disables the agent. It does not remove the default community strings from the configuration file. Therefore, other scanners such as DISAâ€™s SRR may report it as a problem. You must manually edit the configuration file and set your own strings.
